replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
游戏内输入

/mvm set mode creative 世界名称

mode也可以写成gamemode

replies.author: yixiazi
replies.txt_content: gameMode: SURVIVAL   修改这里，修改成为gameMode:Create  这就是创造模式了，要是没用可以在联系我，继续问我的

replies.author: q1024835732
replies.txt_content: gameMode: SURVIVAL，这一项改成创造就行了哦，但是我不记得英文了，貌似是c什么的
